main event: An object was observed splitting into two portions and moving apart in McLean, Virginia on 13 July 1963.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 40 seconds,The object was stationary at the time of the sighting,One part of the object was rising while the other was falling,The object made a sound like a bird,The color of the object was described as grayish white.
sighted object: an object that split into two portions
